#-----Solution-----

#Problem C1

n = int(input())
a = list(map(int, input().split()))

if n == 1:
    print(1)
    print('R')
    exit()

if n == 2:
    if a[0] < a[1]:
        print(2)
        print('LR')
    else:
        print(1)
        print('R')
    exit()

if a[0] < a[1]:
    print(2)
    print('LR')
    exit()

if a[-1] > a[-2]:
    print(2)
    print('RL')
    exit()

print(1)
print('R')

#Problem C2
